name: Strange Platformer Game
description:
In its infancy, it contains several interesting levels and possibly strange gameplay.

The game is currently in active development. I haven't even decided on a final name yet! I would absolutely love it if you, dear player, submitted feedback! This is so that I can make a good game--with your input!

You also may support the game with a donation if you really like the game and would like to help facilitate its development and success.
